# flos-accordion-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                  | Type         | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------ | ----------- |
| `expanded` | `expanded` | Boolean that controls wheter or not the panel is open        | `boolean`    | `undefined` |
| `heading`  | `heading`  | Sets the title of the Accordion Panel                        | `string`     | `undefined` |
| `panelId`  | `panel-id` | Uniqe ID for each accordion panel, passed by the Accordion Wrapper                           | `string`     | `undefined` |
| `subtitle` | `subtitle` | Sets the subtitle of the Accordion Panel                     | `string`     | `undefined` |
| `toggle`   | --         | Prop passed by the Accordion wrapper to control panel toggle | `() => void` | `undefined` |
